title: OSI Global Consulting - Supply Chain Excellence
description: Expert supply chain consulting and planning system implementations across Europe. Specializing in OMP, O9, Kinaxis, Blue Yonder, and SAP integrations.
content:
# Welcome to OSI Global Consulting

## Plan. Transform. Perform.

Expert design and delivery of operational improvements and planning system implementations across Europe and globally.

### Our Differentiators

- **Deep OMP/SAP expertise**: Years of hands-on experience
- **Pragmatic delivery methods**: Proven track record
- **End-to-end supply chain knowledge**: From planning to execution

### Results That Matter

- **35%** Cost reduction achieved
- **20%** Inventory reduction
- **7pts** Service level improvement
- **30+** Years of experience
